articles.title: Petrol crosses Rs 100 in Delhi after 80 paise hike, diesel up 70 paise
articles.description: Petrol in Delhi will now cost Rs 100.21 per litre as against Rs 99.41 previously while diesel rates have gone up from Rs 90.77 per litre to Rs 91.47, according to a price notification of state fuel retailers.
articles.content:
